StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateProgram_AssignContractId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ContractID int, @NWA_ID int, @DutyPreference1 varchar(10), @DutyPreference2 varchar(10), @DutyPreference3 varchar(10), @LastEditBy varchar(50) ) AS
UPDATE PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY SET CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE NWA_ID = @NWA_ID
IF (@DutyPreference1 IS NOT NULL OR @DutyPreference2 IS NOT NULL OR @DutyPreference3 IS NOT NULL) BEGIN UPDATE CONTRACT SET DUTY_PREFERENCE1 = @DutyPreference1, DUTY_PREFERENCE2 = @DutyPreference2, DUTY_PREFERENCE3 = @DutyPreference3, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID END
